code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{apiFetch}from"../utils.js";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function UserList(){const[notes,setNotes]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{async function fetchNotes(){try{const data=await apiFetch("/api/users");setNotes(data);}catch(err){setError("Gagal memuat data catatan.");}}fetchNotes();},[]);if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:"#b00020",fontWeight:"600",textAlign:"center",marginTop:20},children:error});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{maxWidth:480,margin:"40px auto",padding:30,backgroundColor:"#ffffff",borderRadius:12,boxShadow:"0 4px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)",fontFamily:"'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif",color:"#1a237e"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{textAlign:"center",marginBottom:25},children:"Daftar Catatan"}),notes.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:"#4a7023",fontWeight:"500",textAlign:"center",marginTop:20},children:"Tidak ada catatan."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{style:{listStyleType:"none",padding:0,margin:0},children:notes.map(note=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{style:{backgroundColor:"#f9f9f9",marginBottom:15,padding:20,borderRadius:8,boxShadow:"0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{margin:"0 0 8px 0",color:"#1565c0",fontWeight:"600"},children:note.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{style:{color:"#1565c0",fontWeight:"500"},children:new Date(note.date).toLocaleString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{marginTop:12,color:"#444"},children:note.content})]},note.id))})]});}
